title: Neon Soul: A Collection of Poetry and Prose
description: In short, powerful verses, Alexandra Elle shares a hard-won message of hope.Alexandra Elle writes frankly about her experience as a young, single mother while she celebrates her triumph over adversity and promotes resilience and self-care in her readers. This book of all-new poems from the beloved author of Words From A Wanderer and Love In My Language  is a quotable companion on the road to healing.
author: Alexandra Elle
